pr_title: 1785446: Hypervisor update fails when consumer name is null [M]

timeline.message: 1785446: Hypervisor update fails when consumer name is null
1785446: Hypervisor update fails when consumer name is null
1785446: Hypervisor update fails when consumer name is null

timeline.bodyText: Looking at the BZ, it seems like we're hitting an exception if the new name is null or empty. This catches the null condition, but not the empty condition.
timeline.author: Ceiu
